welcome.title: Hi!
welcome.text: Welcome to Mohammad Mahdi Fakharnia's Web Development Hub! Explore my portfolio and discover innovative web solutions crafted with passion and expertise. Let's connect and turn your ideas into digital realities!

welcome.title: Mohammad Mahdi Fakharnia | Full-Stack Developer Expert in .NET, Angular, React, and Node.js
welcome.description: Discover full-stack web development services by Mohammad Mahdi Fakharnia, a seasoned developer specializing in C#, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, .NET Core, React, Next.js, Node.js, and database management with SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Delivering robust and scalable solutions tailored to your business needs.
